# multibrasBOP2

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Package of functions to implement the BOP2 design from Zhou et al. and extend it to multi-arm multi-stage settings.

# Installation

Installation on github

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")

```
